title: chore: runframe update (working without `process`)

title: chore: update runframe
description: Updates the version of the tscircuitrunframe dependency in package.json from 0.0.788 to 0.0.806

title: refactor: replace nanoid with custom randomId implementation
description: Replaces the nanoid dependency with a custom randomId function for generating random string IDs in the circuit element key generation process.

title: feat: add schematic reposition helpers
description: Add repositionSchematicComponentTo and repositionSchematicGroupTo functions for moving schematic components and groups, including bounds calculation and typecheck fixes during transformations.
body:
## Summary
- add `repositionSchematicComponentTo` for moving schematic components and connected elements
- add `repositionSchematicGroupTo` for translating schematic source groups
- expand bounds calculation and transforms to handle schematic elements
- fix typecheck by covering trace routes, junctions, and edges during schematic transformations

## Testing
- `bunx tsc --noEmit`
- `bun test tests/reposition-schematic-component.test.ts tests/reposition-schematic-group.test.ts tests/find-bounds-and-center.test.ts tests/reposition-pcb-component.test.ts tests/reposition-pcb-group.test.ts`
- `bun run format` *(fails: Script not found "format")*

------

title: Fix CAD component recentering and model seating logic

body:
- Remove unused imports from storybook files
- Update biome.json configuration and schema version
- Fix type annotations for React refs
- Update package.json dependencies to newer versions
- Add path resolution alias in storybook config

title: Fix pcbPack Tilting Issue
description: Fixes the pcbPack tilting issue by correcting the rotation calculations in the layout packing process.

title: Update calculate-elbow
description: Updates the calculate-elbow dependency version from 0.0.5 to 0.0.9 in package.json

title: Add support for schematic flex layout
description: Adds support for a new schematic flex layout mode in the Group component, allowing for more flexible arrangement of schematic elements.

title: update error_type from `source_trace_not_connected` to `source_trace_not_connected_error`
description: Changes the error type from source_trace_not_connected to source_trace_not_connected_error in error handling and related tests.

title: Add pos and neg for capacitors defined with footprinter
description: Adds support for positive and negative pin aliases for capacitors defined with footprinter, aligning with IPC standards.

title: Fix match pack not working on overlapping groups
description: Fixes issue where match pack layout fails for overlapping groups in schematic designs

title: build: update dependencies and add sourcemap to build
description: Update React and related types to version 19, remove unused jscad-fiber and react-dom from devDependencies, add sourcemap generation to build script, bump tscircuitfootprinter and vite versions
body:
- Update React and related types to version 19
- Remove unused jscad-fiber and react-dom from devDependencies
- Add sourcemap generation to build script
- Bump @tscircuit/footprinter and vite versions

title: ci: update GitHub Actions workflows and add build check
description: Updates GitHub Actions workflows by upgrading actionscheckout and setup-bun to the latest versions, and adds a new build-check workflow with Node 20 and a frozen lockfile.
body:
- Update actions/checkout and setup-bun to latest versions in bun-pver-release.yml
- Add new build-check workflow with node 20 and frozen lockfile

title: feat: react 19 support
description: Removes react, react-dom, and react-reconciler as they are no longer needed, and updates react-threedrei and react-threefiber to specific versions for better compatibility.
body:
Remove react, react-dom, and react-reconciler as they are no longer needed. Update react-three/drei and react-three/fiber to specific versions for better compatibility.
/claim #92

title: Fix Pin Numbering to Follow Counter Clockwise Convention For Crystal
description: Fixes pin numbering for crystal symbols to follow the counter-clockwise convention, correcting the labels for pins 2 and 4.

title: feat: add support for downloading GLTF models from Circuit JSON
description: Adds a function to download GLTF models from Circuit JSON and updates the DownloadButtonAndMenu component to support GLB and GLTF formats.
body:
- Introduced a new function `downloadGltfFromCircuitJson` to handle the conversion and downloading of GLTF models.
- Updated `DownloadButtonAndMenu` component to include options for downloading both GLB and GLTF formats.
- Added `circuit-json-to-gltf` dependency in `package.json` and `bun.lock` for model conversion.

title: fix(HeaderLogin): adjust dropdown menu pos for mobile
description: Adjusts the position of the dropdown menu in the HeaderLogin component for better mobile usability.

title: decluttter: remove unused components, pages and dependencies
description: Removes unused components, pages, and dependencies, including cleaning up commented code and unused imports.
body:
- Remove unused components (Footer2, StaticViewSnippetHeader, ViewSnippetHeader, etc.)
- Delete unused pages (settings.tsx)
- Clean up unused dependencies (prismjs, input-otp, country-list, etc.)
- Remove "use client" directives from multiple files
- Clean up commented code and unused imports

title: fix(important-files-view): conditionally render AI tabs based on content availability
description: Only show AI description tab when hasAiContent is true and AI review tab when hasAiReview is true or user is owner. This prevents showing empty or irrelevant tabs to users.
body:
â€¦

Only show AI description tab when hasAiContent is true and AI review tab when hasAiReview is true or user is owner. This prevents showing empty or irrelevant tabs to users.

title: perf(important-files-view): optimize file content fetching, prevent multiple reqs and latency to load

title: fix: `process` Reference error in the browser console
description: Fixes the process reference error in the browser console by ensuring the tscircuit code works without needing to define window.process in the HTML.
body:
tscircuit code should work without passing the

```
  <script>
        window.process = { env: { NODE_ENV: "production" } }
      </script>
```
